content.en: Optimizing Cross-Docking: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to address different challenges in cross-docking systems. For example, Tabu Search and genetic algorithms have been found to outperform the CPLEX Solver in assigning trucks to docks with operational time constraints. Variable neighbourhood search (VNS) is recommended for scheduling trucks, while hybrid simulated annealing and hybrid variable neighborhood search are proposed to minimize the total flow time in a cross-docking system. These algorithms offer efficient solutions to optimize truck scheduling and improve the overall operation of cross-docking facilities.
content.da: Optimering af Cross-Docking: Forskere har udforsket forskellige algoritmer for at tackle forskellige udfordringer i cross-docking systemer. For eksempel har Tabu Search og genetiske algoritmer vist sig at overgå CPLEX Solver i tildelingen af lastbiler til kajer med operationelle tidsbegrænsninger. Variable neighbourhood search (VNS) anbefales til planlægning af lastbiler, mens hybrid simulated annealing og hybrid variable neighborhood search foreslås for at minimere den samlede flowtid i et cross-docking system. Disse algoritmer tilbyder effektive løsninger til at optimere lastbilplanlægning og forbedre den overordnede drift af cross-docking faciliteter.
